issue.title: [CI][C++] sccache error on Travis-CI Arm64 build
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17773](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17773). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://app.travis-ci.com/github/apache/arrow/jobs/583166213#L3382

```Java

+ command -v sccache
+ echo '=== sccache stats after the build ==='
=== sccache stats after the build ===
+ sccache --show-stats
/arrow/ci/scripts/cpp_build.sh: line 183: /usr/local/bin/sccache: cannot execute binary file: Exec format error
ERROR: 126
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17773?focusedCommentId=17610325) by Yibo Cai (yibocai):*
Issue resolved by pull request 14201
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14201>
